node.title: Adelaide Hills man pleads guilty to firearms offences after more than 200 weapons seized
node.alt: a trolley full to the brim with rifles
node.description: An Adelaide Hills man has pleaded guilty to more than 80 firearms offences after police seized more than 200 weapons, including an assault rifle, from his rural property.
node.content: ["An Adelaide Hills man has pleaded guilty to dozens of firearms offences after police seized more than 200 weapons \u2014\u00a0including an assault rifle \u2014\u00a0from his rural property.", "The 55-year-old, whom the ABC has chosen not to name for legal reasons, pleaded guilty in the Adelaide Magistrates Court to 87 charges, including possessing unregistered firearms and firearms without a licence, as well as manufacturing a firearm.", "At the time, police said they found more than 200 weapons at his Adelaide Hills\u00a0property, including an assault rifle similar to one used in a mass shooting in the United States, a machine gun, throwing knifes, daggers and bayonets.", "Officers also allegedly seized more than 200 kilograms of ammunition from the house \u2014 a lot of it military ammunition.", "Police previously said the weapons were uncovered during a three-day search of the rural property with some weapons located in hidden rooms and a roof cavity.", "It is also alleged the man kept a pistol in his bedside table.", "At the time, Superintendent Stephen Howard from SA Police's firearms branch said the find was \"disturbing and shocking\".\u00a0", "\"I'm not saying this person would be inclined to do something like that but it's disturbing that these types of weapons are unlawfully in the community.\"", "At the time, he also said the assault rifle had a\u00a0bayonet that could be\u00a0folded under the barrel of the firearm to be used for hand-to-hand combat.", "The man's lawyer, Andy Ey, today handed Magistrate John Wells a sheet with written guilty pleas to the 87 charges.", "The prosecutor applied to revoke the man's bail but Mr Ey said his client had already spent 13 months in custody.", "He has been on bail since September last year.\u00a0", "Magistrate Wells rejected the application and remanded\u00a0the man on continuing bail to face court again in January."]
